3Python: 3.7, 3.8, 3.9, 3.10Django: 2.2, 3.2django CMS: 3.7 - 3.10**********Quickstart**********Install djangocms-page-tags:: pip install djangocms-page-tagsThen add it to INSTALLED_APPS along with its dependencies:: "taggit", "taggit_autosuggest", "djangocms_page_tags",Add ``taggit_autosuggest`` to urlconf:: path("taggit_autosuggest", include("taggit_autosuggest.urls")),Execute migration:: $ python manage.py migrate*****Usage*****You will find two new items in the toolbar Page menu:* Title tags (per language)* Page tags (global)These items allows to add tags to ``Title`` and ``Page`` instances, respectively************Templatetags************``djangocms-page-tags`` allows showing tags using four templatetags* ``include_page_tags``* ``include_title_tags``* ``page_tags``* ``title_tags``*************Documentation*************For further documentation see https://djangocms-page-tags.readthedocs.io/.. |Gitter| image::
